description.body: Patch 14.7 is a lighter balance patch for Cyber City that’s competitively minded, as it will be played across multiple competitions, including our final Cyber City Tactician’s Crown (July 11 through 13th). While the changes may be light for Cyber City, we’ve also got substantial adjustments for Double Up with the goal of reducing three-star 4-costs. Our other modes continue to pop off as well, with balance updates for Pengu’s Party and Revival: Remix Rumble alike!
